title: The Scientist
lyrics:
[intro] (Am)  (F)  (C)  (G)
 
(Am) Come up to (F)meet you, tell you I'm (C)sorry
You don't know how (G)lovely you are
(Am) I had to (F)find you, tell you I (C)need you
Tell you I (G)set you apart
 
(Am) Tell me your (F)secrets and nurse me your (C)questions
Oh lets go (G)back to the start
(Am) Running in (F)circles, comin' in (C)tails
Heads on a (G)science apart
 
[chorus]
(F) Nobody said it was easy
(C) Oh it's such a (G)shame for us to part
(F) Nobody said it was easy
(C) No one ever (Am)said it would be this (G)hard [stop]
Oh take me back to the (C)start (F)  (C)  (G)
 
(Am) I was just (F)guessin' at numbers and (C)figures
Pulling the (G)puzzles apart
(Am) Questions of (F)science, science and (C)progress
Don't speak as (G)loud as my heart
 
(Am) And tell me you (F)love me, come back and (C)haunt me
Oh and I (G)rush to the start
(Am) Runnin' in (F)circles, chasin' (C)tails
Comin' (G)back as we are
 
[chorus]
(F) Nobody said it was easy
(C) Oh it's such a (G)shame for us to part
(F) Nobody said it was easy
(C) No one ever (Am)said it would be so (G)hard [stop]
Iâ€™m going back to the (C)start (F)  (C)  (G)
(Am)  (F)  (C)  (G)
 
[outro]
(Am) Oh-(F)ohhh oh-oh-(C)ohhhh
(Am) Oh-(F)ohhh oh-oh-(C)ohhhh
[single strum] (Am) Oh-(F)ohhh oh-oh-(C)ohhhh [end]
